thread.title: paul carbone

author: paul carbone
title: paul carbone
text: Not only did I get a great price for my car, the manager that brokered the deal was fantastic. He was friendly and professional and quick. He answered all my questions and explained all aspects of the process. I never felt like I was making the wrong choice going with this buyer. And most importantly, I got a much better price than what I was Quote: d by several other companies over the phone.
